name: Caramel Apple Monkey Bread
author: Jennifer Rowe
summary: Monkey bread gets an upgrade when paired with warm, cinnamon-sugar coated apples.
ingredients: 1 large apple - peeled, cored, and chopped into 20 chunks
1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Spray a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®) with cooking spray
Mix white sugar and cinnamon together in a medium bowl
Add apple chunks and stir to coat thoroughly
Wrap 1 piece of dough around a coated apple chunk and pinch to seal shut
Dip in melted butter, then roll in brown sugar
Arrange balls of dough in even circles in the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes
Carefully invert pan onto a large plate so caramel mixture runs over each piece
